title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

FRIDAY OCTOBER 4, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ****

Your ruling planet Mars is now moving through peace-loving Libra. So –for the next few weeks – your daily mantra is from Robert Louis Stevenson “Compromise is the best and cheapest lawyer.”

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ***

With the Sun, Venus and Mars in your wellbeing zone, be more proactive about finding a fitness routine that keeps you motivated. And choose healthy food options that you actually enjoy eating.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ***

Mighty Mars shifts into your self-expression zone until November 19. So - if you channel energy into creative pursuits - there’s less likelihood you’ll waste precious time feeling rushed and restless.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ***

Calling all Crabs! With the Sun, Venus and Mars all visiting your domestic zone, strive to be more proactive AND diplomatic about a current family problem. Which will be a challenging juggle.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ***

Dynamic Mars is moving through your communication zone until November 19. So confidence and optimism are high. But avoid passing on unsubstantiated information or jumping to hasty conclusions.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ***

The more you nurture your finances, the more they will flourish in the future. Don’t be impatient though! Managing cash and credit carefully now will lead to financial security in the years ahead.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ****

With Mars moving through your sign – until November 19 – it’s time to be bold and beautiful. Confidence is in, and complacency is out; as you go after what you want with plenty of passion and pizazz.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ***

Take your foot off the intensity pedal and slow down Scorpio! With the Sun, Venus and Mars in your solitude zone, make it a priority to enjoy some solo time as you relax, recuperate and rejuvenate.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

Your Sagittarian motto for the moment is from birthday great, actress and activist Susan Sarandon. “I take responsibility for the ups and downs of my life, and that is very liberating.”

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ****

Present your best professional face because others are taking notice of a more empowered you. Socialising, networking and joint ventures are favoured. But don’t neglect loved ones in the process.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ****

Adventure is calling! With Mars in your travel zone, do all you can to book a heavenly holiday or weekend getaway for some time soon. Somewhere with a sense of adventure would be perfect.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ***

Lust and/or loot are highlighted, as mighty Mars moves into your money and intimacy zone until November 19. So strive to be more passionately proactive about a financial matter or a sexual partnership.

YOUR DAY

Mars – the planet of war – moves into Libra, the sign of peace.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

You are a headstrong and humorous person. 2020 is the year to spend more leisure time with your nearest and dearest.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
